headline: Mastercard Agent Suite Launch Adds New Angle To AI Valuation Story
summary: Mastercard (NYSE:MA) has introduced Agent Suite, a new offering aimed at helping enterprises adopt agentic AI in their operations. The suite provides customizable AI agents and advisory services designed to support integration into areas such as customer support and commerce. For investors watching NYSE:MA, Agent Suite sits at the intersection of payments, data and artificial intelligence, an area that many banks and merchants are actively exploring. By focusing on AI agents tied to...
